__e: Yes. I suppose that was part of his perverse fantasy.
Oh, someone who wanted to destroy his fantasy, not only frame him for murder, but make him believe he was responsible.
Someone who framed him for murder, destroyed his fantasy?
If I was looking for a man who might have shot your daughter... and I had a limited imagination, of which I do not... I might have looked at the poor bastard you found today.
Whatever it is, it can't be worse than my imagination.
It isn't my imagination. It's... it's something else.
I admit, I lack the imagination to even conceive of someone like you.
Maybe I could make fantasy meet reality somehow.
And this is in the imagination of a 7-year-old girl.
Why don't you tell me your fantasy and let's see if we can help. If...
So you want me to let someone else follow you into your fantasy?
Oh, and sorry it took me so long to tell you that and it was only in your imagination.
